song_lyrics: Re sundarvar bolyā Shyām, kahe chhe vā’lo potānu dhām... Re sundar° ṭek
Re bhinna-bhinna ākāsh rachāye, re jujavo shabda temā thāye;
Tem ja sahumā ved mune gāye... Re sundar° 1
Re Akṣhar shakti ghaṇī sārī, re brahmānḍ pratye nyārī nyārī;
Temā sahu mūrtio mārī... Re sundar° 2
Re Akṣhar anant kaḷā dhāre, re agaṇit rūp thāu tyāre;
Mune jīv pāme eṇedvāre†... Re sundar° 3
Re Akṣhar koṭino hu Swāmī, re mujmā rahe sahu lay pāmī;
Shobhu sadā ek rūp dhāmī... Re sundar° 4
Re satsangī sahu nar nārī, tam arathe āje deh dhārī;
title: Re sundarvar bolyā Shyām

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-451: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
